mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(ss.`name`, ',', ss.logo_image) as storeName FROM sm_store ss INNER JOIN om_order oo ON oo.store_id = ss.id WHERE oo.id = #{orderId}
SELECT po.ship_name, po.`phone`, po.`ship_address`, po.`area_name` FROM om_order oo INNER JOIN pay_order po ON po.id = oo.`pay_order_id` WHERE oo.id = #{orderId}

select o.id orderId,p.area_name,o.goods_type,o.`status`,o.ship_money,o.total_money,o.total_money needPayMoney, o.real_money,o.create_time,o.pay_time,o.send_time,o.receive_time,p.pay_order_no,p.pay_type_code ,o.real_money payAmount,s.id storeId,s.name storeName,o.um_user_id,u.phone,p.ship_address detailedAddress, p.phone mobile,u.name name,p.ship_name,o.real_user_id FROM om_order o,pay_order p,sm_store s,um_user u,um_area_shipping a where o.pay_order_id=p.id and o.store_id=s.id and o.um_user_id=u.id and o.area_shipping_id=a.id and o.id=#{id}

select o.goods_type,o.id orderId,o.`status`,o.um_user_id,u.name name,o.create_time,o.pay_time,o.send_time,o.receive_time, p.pay_order_no,p.pay_type_code,o.total_money,o.red_envelops_money,o.shop_ticket_money, o.ship_money,o.tax_money,o.real_money,p.ship_name,p.phone mobile,p.area_name,p.ship_address detailedAddress
FROM om_order o,pay_order p,um_user u where o.pay_order_id=p.id and o.um_user_id=u.id and o.del_flag=0 and u.del_flag=0 and o.id=#{id}

select o.goods_type,o.id orderId,o.`status`,p.ship_name,p.phone mobile,p.area_name,p.ship_address detailedAddress, l.logi_name,l.logistics_no,l.data FROM om_order o,pay_order p,om_order_logistics l where o.pay_order_id=p.id and o.id=l.order_id and o.del_flag=0 and o.id=#{id}
select p.* from om_order o,pay_order p where o.id=#{orderId} and p.id=o.pay_order_id
select sum(g.reward_shop_ticket) from om_order o,om_goods_temp g where o.del_flag=0 and g.del_flag=0 and g.order_id=o.id and o.id=#{orderId}

SELECT o.id orderId, o.goods_type, o.`status`, o.create_time, o.pay_time, o.send_time, o.receive_time, o.close_time, p.pay_order_no, o.total_money, o.red_envelops_money, o.shop_ticket_money, o.ship_money, o.tax_money, o.real_money, p.ship_name, p.phone mobile, p.area_name, p.ship_address detailedAddress, o.remark, o.q_r_code, s.id storeId, s.`name` storeName, s.company_addr, s.owner_mobile
FROM om_order o, pay_order p, sm_store s WHERE o.pay_order_id = p.id AND o.store_id = s.id AND o.id = #{orderId}
select id goodsTempId,g.name goodsName,sku_id,icon picture,sell_price,standard_str,number from om_goods_temp g where g.del_flag=0 and order_id=#{orderId}

select SUM(g.reward_integrate*number) rewardIntegral, SUM(g.reward_experience*number) rewardExperience ,SUM(g.reward_shop_ticket*number) rewardShopTicket from om_goods_temp g where order_id=#{orderId} and del_flag=0

select SUM(reward_shop_ticket*number) reward_shop_ticket,SUM(reward_experience*number) reward_experience,SUM(reward_integrate*number ) reward_integrate, sum(real_pay_money) realPayMoney from om_goods_temp where order_id=#{orderId} and can_after_sale=1 and del_flag=0

select SUM(ogt.reward_integrate*ogt.number) rewardShopTicket, SUM(ogt.reward_experience*ogt.number) rewardIntegral, SUM(ogt.reward_shop_ticket*ogt.number) rewardExperience from om_goods_temp ogt inner join om_order oo on oo.id = ogt.order_id where oo.pay_order_id = #{payOrderId} and del_flag=0

SELECT t.sku_id, t.number number, t.reward_shop_ticket, u.sell_price, g.activity_cost_rate, u.profit_rate, u.supplier_price, u.operation_cost, g.generalize_cost_rate
FROM pm_goods_sku u, pm_goods g, om_goods_temp t WHERE u.goods_id = g.id and t.sku_id=u.id and t.order_id=#{orderId} and t.can_after_sale=0 AND u.del_flag = 0 AND g.del_flag = 0 and t.del_flag=0

select o.goods_type,o.id orderId,o.`status`,o.real_money,o.total_number,o.store_id, s.name storeName FROM om_order o,sm_store s where o.store_id=s.id and s.id=#{storeId} and
(o.status=3 or o.status=4)
o.status=5
and (o.goods_type='自取' or o.goods_type='服务类') and o.del_flag=0 and s.del_flag=0 order by o.update_time desc

select SUM(reward_shop_ticket*number) reward_shop_ticket,SUM(reward_experience*number) reward_experience,SUM(reward_integrate*number ) reward_integrate, sum(real_pay_money) realPayMoney from om_goods_temp where id=#{goodsTempId}

SELECT t.sku_id, t.number number, t.reward_shop_ticket, u.sell_price, g.activity_cost_rate, u.profit_rate, u.supplier_price, u.operation_cost, g.generalize_cost_rate
FROM pm_goods_sku u, pm_goods g, om_goods_temp t WHERE u.goods_id = g.id and t.sku_id=u.id and t.id=#{goodsTempId} and t.can_after_sale=0 AND u.del_flag = 0 AND g.del_flag = 0 and t.del_flag=0

SELECT p.pay_order_no payTransactionId,p.pay_amount totalAmount,p.pay_time tradingTime ,o.id orderNo FROM `om_order` o,pay_order p where o.pay_order_id=p.id and o.del_flag=0 and p.enabled=1 and o.id=#{orderId}
